attributes.action: RESEARCH HAS SHOWN THAT BOTH BEING OVER THE `DRINK DRIVE` LIMIT AND MOBILE PHONES ARE THE SAME
attributes.additional_details: WE THE UNDERSIGNED WANT THE SAME `LAW` FOR BOTH `DRINK DRIVING` AND USING A `MOBILE PHONE` WHILE DRIVING DUE TO THE FACT RESEARCH HAS PROVEN THAT THEY `BOTH` HAVE THE SAME DANGERS ON THE HIGHWAY, OTHER PEOPLES SAFETY SHOULD COME FIRST, EVERYDAY DRIVERS ARE ON THERE PHONES TRYING TO GET ARAOUND A JUNCTION ONE HANDED AND OFTEN ON THE WRONG SIDE OF THE ROAD PUTTING LIVES AT RISK, CHANGE THE LAW PLEASE.
